Articles.Content:
This request is simple,

There are many games were death is permanent, where you can name the individuals that are in the game. You can name them after friends, family, even viewers of your livestream. This gives them uniqueness and personality, and makes it hurt even more when they die.

Kerbals can die often in KSP, especially now with the new aerodynamic and thermodynamic systems in place. So I would like a mod that allows you 'add' custom kerbals that you get to name and then hire from the astronaut complex to be a part of your space program.
[Ship Manifest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62270) lets you create and rename kerbals.
